sentences.en: A microorganism is too small to see with the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 微生物太小,不能用肉眼看见.

sentences.en: A single - celled microorganism, especially a flagellate protozoan of the genus Monas.
sentences.cn: 单胞体 单细胞 的微生物, 尤指单''.'胞'. ''虫类的有鞭毛的原生动物.

sentences.en: Abstract: The quantity change regularity of microorganism was studied.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 研究了序批式生物膜反应器中微生物量的变化特点.

sentences.en: Aeration is a tank where microorganism decompose organism in waste water.
sentences.cn: 曝气池是栖息在活性污泥中的微生物分解污水中有机物的场所.

sentences.en: Aim To synthesize gastrodin via biotransformation of microorganism using p - hydroxybenzaldehyde as substrate.
sentences.cn: 目的以对羟基苯甲醛为底物,通过微生物的转化作用生物合成天麻素.

sentences.en: Bacteria belong to the microorganism.
sentences.cn: 细菌属于微生物.

sentences.en: Bad flavor in milk could produce because of microorganism and physiochemical reason.
sentences.cn: 由于加工过程中微生物和理化的原因,容易使乳制品产生不良风味.

sentences.en: In order to improve the microorganism fermentation process of producing glutamine, an electrodialysis method was developed to separate glutamic acid and glutamine.
sentences.cn: 为改进微生物发酵法生产谷氨酰胺的流程，提出用电渗析方法来分离谷氨酰胺和谷氨酸。

sentences.en: Kinetic characteristics of valonia tannin biodegradation using natural microorganism groups were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了微生物菌系对橡单宁的生物降解能力.

sentences.en: Novel antifungal antibiotics from microorganism have been found one after another.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,新的微生物来源的抗真菌药物不断涌现.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of microorganism elimination by routine purified technology of water plants in Shenzhen.
sentences.cn: 目的调查分析深圳区镇水厂常规水处理工艺去除微生物的净化效果。

sentences.en: Observe microorganism in the water and in the sediment by a microscope.
sentences.cn: 用显微镜观察水样本和基质样本中的微生物.

sentences.en: Slight mutations that allow a microorganism to resist the full killing power of a medicine are an evolutionary advantage that greatly expedites the development of drug resistance.
sentences.cn: 略微的突变即可使微生物具有抵抗力，使药物完全失去杀伤力，这种突变是一个进化优势，大大加快了耐药性的产生。

sentences.en: Spread the contents of the amber onto a petri dish containing a microorganism food like starch or soy.
sentences.cn: 把琥珀内嵌标本放在皮氏培养皿中，并加入微生物食品，比如淀粉或大豆。

sentences.en: The microorganism action also include the addition of starter cultures in cheese.
sentences.cn: 干酪中的微生物作用也包括人为添加发酵剂的作用.

sentences.en: The results show the polymer gel has good cooperation with microorganism germ.
sentences.cn: 试验结果表明,聚合物凝胶体系与微生物具有良好的配伍性,具备技术联作的可操作性.

sentences.en: There are still some problems in culturing and identifying the marine microorganism.
sentences.cn: 在培养及鉴定海洋微生物等方面还面临许多问题.

sentences.en: Theresults show: vanillin has strong inhibited effect to the microorganism.
sentences.cn: 结果表明, 香兰素 具有较强的抑菌作用.

sentences.en: This is actually just a microorganism. But it has roughly 500 genes.
sentences.cn: 这其实只不过是一个微生物，却拥有约500个基因。

sentences.en: To research the pathogenic microorganism characters of chronic pharyngitis.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究慢性咽炎的病原学问题.

phrases.tran_cn: 病原微生物；致病微生物

trans.tran_en: a living thing that is so small that it cannot be seen without a  microscope
